entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl, described as taking off into the sky with a moment's pressure on his arm. ("dows; with a moment’s pressure on his arm Hedwig took off into the blindingly bright sky.")

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the inhabitant of Hagrid's hut, which is described as uninhabited. ("He watched her until she became a tiny black speck and vanished, then switched his gaze to Hagrid’s hut, clearly visible from this window, and just as clearly uninhabited...")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character, described as watching Hedwig take off and later seeing a great reptilian winged horse. ("He watched her until she became a tiny black speck and vanished, then switched his gaze to Hagrid’s hut... Harry watched them, savoring the fresh air on his face...")

entities.name: forbidden forest
entities.description: The Forbidden Forest is mentioned as swaying in a light breeze. ("The treetops of the Forbidden Fo rest swayed in a light breeze.")

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: Quidditch is mentioned as something Harry will be thinking about later. ("Harry watched them, savoring the fresh air on his face, thinking about Quidditch later...")

relationships.description: Harry observed Hedwig taking off into the sky. ("dows; with a moment’s pressure on his arm Hedwig took off into the blindingly bright sky.")
Harry observed the Forbidden Forest swaying in a light breeze. ("The treetops of the Forbidden Fo rest swayed in a light breeze.")
Harry was thinking about Quidditch later. ("Harry watched them, savoring the fresh air on his face, thinking about Quidditch later...")
Harry observed a great reptilian winged horse. ("A great, reptilian winged horse... rose up out of the trees like a grotesque, giant bird.")
